title: Meet Pingu [DVDR] [TNT Village]
description:

.: Plot :.

Pingu is a clay penguin who is very mischievous and playful. He lives in the arctic where he plays with his family and his friend the seal. His signature sound is something like "mweep mweep". 

.: Trama :.

Pingu abita al Polo Sud e vive tante divertenti avventure tra i ghiacci insieme ai suoi amici, alla sua famiglia e alle foche.
